function.description: Retrieve the dimensions, such as area and perimeter, of a triangle if lengths of three sides are given.
function.name: triangle_properties.get

get_angles.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the internal angles of triangle. Default is true.

get_area.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the area of triangle. Default is true.

get_perimeter.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the perimeter of triangle. Default is true.

side1.description: The length of first side of the triangle.

side2.description: The length of second side of the triangle.

side3.description: The length of third side of the triangle.

function.description: Retrieve the dimensions, such as area and circumference, of a circle if radius is given.
function.name: circle_properties.get

get_area.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the area of circle. Default is true.

get_circumference.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the circumference of circle. Default is true.

radius.description: The length of radius of the circle.

question.content: Given a triangle with side lengths of 5, 4, and 3 units, can its dimensions and properties be determined?

function.description: Calculates the area of a triangle using Heron's formula, given the lengths of its three sides.
function.name: math.triangle_area_heron

side1.description: Length of the first side of the triangle.

side2.description: Length of the second side of the triangle.

side3.description: Length of the third side of the triangle.

function.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
function.name: math.circle_area

function.description: Calculates the area of a triangle using the formula (1/2)base*height.
function.name: math.triangle_area_base_height

base.description: The base length of the triangle.

question.content: Given a triangle with side lengths 3, 4, and 5, please calculate its area.

function.description: Fetch the largest city of a specified country.
function.name: country_info.largest_city

function.description: Fetch the capital city of a specified country.
function.name: country_info.capital

function.description: Fetch the current population of a specified country.
function.name: country_info.population

question.content: Which city is the capital of Brazil?

function.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points.
function.name: EuclideanDistance.calculate

rounding.description: Optional: The number of decimals to round off the result. Default 0

function.description: Calculate the angle between two points with respect to x-axis.
function.name: angleToXAxis.calculate

rounding.description: Optional: The number of decimals to round off the result. Default 0

question.content: Determine the Euclidean distance between point A (3, 4) and point B (1, 2).
